text: Henry Fabi√°n Kronfle Kozhaya (born 1972) is an Ecuadorian businessman and politician. He has been the President of the National Assembly since November 2023. He has been a member of the National Assembly since 2017. He is running for President of Ecuador in the 2025 general election. In August 2024, Kronfle registered to run for president in the 2025 general election under the Christian Social Party ticket. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1972 births Category:Presidents of the National Assembly of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil Category:Businesspeople from Guayaquil Category:Politicians from Quito
title: Henry Kronfle
